name: Headlights
description:
Inspired by Highway Pursuit, but more about upgrade path choices than lightning-fast reactions.

You are Miffed Maxine, fleeing down a highway from the Guzzoline Gang.  Your twin min-cannons are running low and ammo and your car could use an upgrade... can you make it to the next repair station?

A couple mechanics are deliberately not explained -- figuring stuff out is supposed to be part of the fun.

(The long-term plan is to take it in a Roguelike direction -- Spelunky/FTL/Kingdom series)
